name: Burning Secrets - A Bara Visual Novel
name_original: Burning Secrets - A Bara Visual Novel
description:
Bara, BxB, Polyamorous, Muscle, Gay, Multiple Endings


  • Choice System
  • Unique Endings
  • Polyamorous Ending
  • Game Gallery
  • Around 1~2 hours of gameplay
  • Steam Achievements


After Diego return to his world, Luxus, Zafir, and Fin carry on their peaceful life in Burning Horns. However, in one of Zafir's expeditions, the old wizard disappears and Fin decided to rescue him with Luxus's help. Embark on this journey in Luxus' shoes and have the opportunity to fall in love with one of them. You don't need to be familiar with Burning Horns: A Bara Isekai JRPG to understand this new story even though the first game can give you a complete notion about some of the places the characters mention.
